2 weeks ago on August 9th, my father supposedly saw something rather unusual happen at an Olive Garden located in Boston, Massachusetts. The following is a recounting of the event: My dad had just finished his night shift at his warehouse job and decided to go to Olive Garden for a quick meal. The moment he entered through the front doors of the Olive Garden, he was welcomed by one of the waiters at the front counter, escorted to one of the tables close to the middle of the room, and asked about what he wanted to order. He ended up ordering a Chicken and Shrimp Carbonara, and a Sprite after a few minutes of deliberation. In response, the waiter just nodded, handed him a tray of breadsticks, and left. Now somewhat bored, my father decided to start surveying the area around him. According to him, there wasn't much worth seeing, aside from one minor exception. To the left side of the room, there was a woman who hadn't been given complimentary breadsticks, even though she had definitely entered the Olive Garden before my dad. And shortly after he was able to put together how such a situation came to be in his head, the woman ushered a waiter over to her and inquired about just that. The moment she shut her mouth, the waiter she was talking to allegedly made a noise which was akin to that of a malfunctioning cement mixer, had his eyes roll back into his head and then proceeded to disgorge what looked to be a mixture of mushy breadsticks and bits of discolored rotini pasta onto the poor woman’s table. Seconds after that had happened, my dad simply stood up, ran out the door, got into his car, and then drove all the way home.

[[/div]]

So basically I’ve hit a roadblock and was wondering if anyone else could enlighten me more on the nature of what happened on that night, maybe even give a concrete explanation for it! What better place to look for answers than Parawatch?
